document.full_text: even in the heart of sri lanka's financial capital, convicted hedge fund founder and one-time billionaire raj rajaratnam remains a mystery to many on the island of his birth.
document.title: in his native sri lanka, rajaratnam is no household name
lines_and_colors: even in the heart of sri lanka's financial capital, convicted hedge fund founder and one-time billionaire raj rajaratnam remains a mystery to many on the island of his birth.
